extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Browser Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of Google Chrome or other Chromium-based browsers to determine if it is affected.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the browser version prior to 126.0.6478.114/115?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Chromium-based Browsers
extracted_playbook.description: Update Google Chrome or other Chromium-based browsers to the latest version available to mitigate vulnerabilities.

affected_products: Google Chrome versions prior to 126.0.6478.114/115 for Windows and Mac
Google Chrome versions prior to 126.0.6478.114 for Linux
